name: Card Tales
description:
Adventure card time!


Collect cards in your hand and use them to complete quests and defeat enemies.

SANDBOX

In Card Tales you can use cards to get an unexpected result. Apply your logic, experiment with new decisions.
The story is branched, there is a simplified "legacy" mechanics, your actions affect this game and the following games.

Use powerful weapons!


  • Unlock 3 stories, each with 2 different endings.
  • Some crazy, dangerous enemies.
  • Your actions affect the environment!
